Items.Title: Application No. C 150360 ZMK submitted by 14-18 Carroll LLC pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 16a, changing from an M1-1 District to an R6B District property bounded by Carroll Street, a line 380 feet northwesterly of Columbia Street, a line midway between Carroll Street and Summit Street, a line midway between Carroll Street and Hamilton Avenue, and a line 450 feet northwesterly of Columbia Street, Borough of Brooklyn, Community Board 6, Council District 39.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application No. N 160379 ZRK submitted by 14-18 Carroll LLC pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying Appendix F (Inclusionary Housing Designated Areas) for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community Board 6, Council District 39.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application No. C 150360 ZMK submitted by 14-18 Carroll LLC pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 16a, changing from an M1-1 District to an R6B District property bounded by Carroll Street, a line 380 feet northwesterly of Columbia Street, a line midway between Carroll Street and Summit Street, a line midway between Carroll Street and Hamilton Avenue, and a line 450 feet northwesterly of Columbia Street, Borough of Brooklyn, Community Board 6, Council District 39.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Disapproved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
